explains: n. 好斗性，攻击性；侵略，侵犯，挑衅

sentences.en: Aggression is by no means a male-only trait.
sentences.cn: 攻击性决不是男性独有的特征。

sentences.en: We must demonstrate that aggression will not pay.
sentences.cn: 我们必须证明侵犯是没有好处的。

sentences.en: Sport became the perfect outlet for his aggression.
sentences.cn: 运动成为他攻击性心理的最佳出路。
